Posts.Content: I finished treatment two weeks ago it's a strange feeling after having fifteen rounds of radiotherapy I am also on tablets for five years  I I have an appointment with the oncology doctor in may then In January I have a mammogram  The cancer got taken out january the second from my right breast  I am starting counselling next monday it as effected me a lot i have stayed strong for everyone else Also I am going to see a doctor to complain a bout why I was not called back to the hospital after a cyst had showed up on the mammogram it took me to go to the doctors to say something was not right a biopsy was done and behind the cyst was the cancer it was my boyfriend who said go to the doctors
Posts.Title: End of treatment
